# tech_blog Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-09-30

## Active Technologies
- HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+, Markdown + Static site generator (11ty/Jekyll/Hugo), CSS preprocessor (Sass/PostCSS), syntax highlighter (Prism.js/highlight.js) (001-clean-minimal-tech)
- CSS3, Sass/SCSS + Eleventy (11ty), Sass compiler, PostCSS, Prism.js (002-design-update)
- Static files (no database required) (002-design-update)

## Project Structure
```

tests/
```

## Code Style
HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+, Markdown: Follow standard conventions
